      • calcAddedCost

        public int calcAddedCost(int var,
                int val,
                ImmutableProblem p)
        Parameters:
        var -
        val -
        p -
        Returns:
        the cost that will be added (or all ready added) to this assignment by assigning var <- val in the problem p this includes binary and unary costs means: costOf(assignment + ) - costOf(assignment - ) * (increase cc checks)

      • calcCostWithout

        p -
        Returns:
        the cost of the assignment without the given variable assignment
